name: Rapid Racer Bike
description: The Rapid Racer Bike is a stylish and sturdy ride-on toy for kids. It features adjustable seat height, durable construction, and smooth wheels for a comfortable ride. Suitable for children aged 3-6 years.

name: Super Scooter Pro
description: The Super Scooter Pro is a high-performance scooter for kids who love outdoor fun. It has a lightweight frame, adjustable handlebars, and a rear foot brake for added safety. Suitable for children aged 5 and above.

name: Turbo Trike
description: The Turbo Trike is a thrilling three-wheeled ride-on toy that provides stability and excitement. It features a sturdy steel frame, wide wheels, and a comfortable seat. Suitable for children aged 2-4 years.

name: Electric Cruiser Car
description: The Electric Cruiser Car is a battery-powered ride-on car that offers a realistic driving experience for young children. It has working headlights, MP3 player connectivity, and a remote control for parental supervision. Suitable for children aged 3-6 years.

name: Balance Bike Pro
description: The Balance Bike Pro is a pedal-free bike that helps children develop balance and coordination skills. It features an adjustable seat and handlebars, puncture-resistant tires, and a lightweight frame. Suitable for children aged 2-5 years.

name: Mini Moto ATV
description: The Mini Moto ATV is a mini-sized all-terrain vehicle for adventurous kids. It has a powerful electric motor, off-road tires, and a sturdy frame. Suitable for children aged 6 and above.

name: Pedal Go-Kart
description: The Pedal Go-Kart is a pedal-powered racing kart that offers hours of outdoor fun. It features adjustable seat position, pneumatic tires, and a hand brake for easy stopping. Suitable for children aged 4-8 years.

name: Convertible Tricycle
description: The Convertible Tricycle is a versatile ride-on toy that can transform from a tricycle to a balance bike. It has a sturdy frame, adjustable seat height, and non-slip handles. Suitable for children aged 1-3 years.

name: Glider Scooter
description: The Glider Scooter is a fun and lightweight scooter with a unique gliding motion. It has three wheels for stability, an adjustable handlebar, and a rear foot brake. Suitable for children aged 3-6 years.

name: Classic Wooden Rocking Horse
description: The Classic Wooden Rocking Horse is a timeless ride-on toy that brings joy to children. It is made from high-quality wood, has a comfortable seat, and sturdy handles. Suitable for children aged 2-5 years.
